sizes_available: 0-3 mos (3-6 mos, 6-12 mos, 12-18 mos, 2, 4, 6, 8, 10) To be worn with approx 2” / 5 cm positive ease
full_text: Want more beautiful, free patterns? Sign up for our newsletter and follow us on Instagram @EweKnitTO so you never miss a pattern! Designed by Claudia Q The Coco Cardigan is the perfect striped layering piece for your little one. A top down circular yoke cardigan made in the Fibre Co. Canopy Fingering. SIZES 0-3 mos (3-6 mos, 6-12 mos, 12-18 mos, 2, 4, 6, 8, 10) To be worn with approx 2” / 5cm positive ease. Finished Measurements Chest Circumference: 16 (18, 20, 22, 24, 26, 28, 30, 32)” / 40.5 (45.5, 51, 56, 61, 66, 71, 76, 81) cm Body Length to Underarm (at front): 3 (3 1/2, 4, 4 1/2, 5 1/2, 6, 6 1/2, 7, 7 1/2)” / 7.5 (9, 10, 11.5, 14, 15, 16.5, 18, 19) cm Sleeve length to Underarm: 5 3/4 (6, 7, 8, 8 1/2, 10, 11 1/2, 13, 14)” / 14.5 (15, 18, 20.5, 21.5, 25.5, 29, 33, 35.5) cm Upper Arm: 6 1/2 (6 3/4, 8, 8 1/4, 9, 10, 10 1/2, 11, 11 1/4)” / 16.5 (17, 20.5, 21, 23, 25.5, 26.5, 28, 28.5) cm Yoke Depth: 3 1/2 (4, 4 1/2, 5, 5, 5 1/2, 6, 6 1/2, 7)” / 9 (10, 11.5, 12.5, 12.5, 14, 15, 16.5, 18) cm For pattern support: patterns@eweknit.ca
name: Ravelry: Coco Cardigan pattern by Claudia Quintanilla - EweKnit Toronto
